name: listhis
description: A fast, dynamic and private checklist to record patient history.

scripts.is-linted:js: npx eslint "./src/**/*.js" && echo Successfully checked all .js files!
scripts.is-linted:md: npx markdownlint "**/*.md" --ignore node_modules && echo Successfully checked all .md files!
scripts.lint:js: npx eslint --fix "./src/**/*.js" && echo Successfully linted all .js files!
scripts.lint:md: npx markdownlint --fix "**/*.md" --ignore node_modules && echo Successfully linted all .md files!
